text:
First off, allow me to give you kudos on an excellent 'evolving' 
project 'ANT'.  I have been designated to find out the 'guts' and how ant works 
as our company is considering it seriously.  I have installed it at home to get 
better acquainted with it, but keep coming up short.  I've set up the 
environment variables the way the should be, but for some reason I keep getting 
a java.notFound exception when I run it.  Could you tell me if ANT runs on 2k 
professional?  I'd like to get it up and running and perhaps get more 
information as I use it.

Thank you for your help,
and keep up the excellent work.

Josh Molina
Software Developer
Boston, MA.
creator: jmolina03@yahoo.com

text:
Yes, it does.

If you have further questions, please come to the ant-user@jakarta.apache.org 
mailinglist. 

Information needed would be: 
- Where is Ant installed 
- Where is JDK installed
- How does your environment look like
creator: nico@apache.org
